duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide supervision for clients and ensure their safety while building rapport with them.
Assist clients in working with a group and handling individual problems.
Create documentation of the client’s progress and identify the possible need for professional services.
Contribute to the care and upkeep of the environment of care.
Facilitate daily schedule, activities, and events for residents.
Complete daily shift notes for individual clients and communicate with treatment teams about client concerns.
Provide transportation to residents for community outings and meetings.
Practice compliance with all policies, record-keeping requirements, checklist assignments, and documentation.
Remain current and up to date on all necessary trainings and certifications.
Provide support to assigned pod and perform all other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Degree or GED required; bachelor’s level degree in psychology, counseling, or sociology preferred.
Valid driver’s license and eligibility for insurance coverage for driving company’s vehicles.
